00029 #include "StimulusBoundaryCondition.hpp"
00030 #include "PdeSimulationTime.hpp"
00031 
00032 template<unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00033 StimulusBoundaryCondition<SPACE_DIM>::StimulusBoundaryCondition(AbstractStimulusFunction* pStimulus)
00034 {
00035     mpStimulus = pStimulus;
00036 }
00037 
00038 template<unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00039 double StimulusBoundaryCondition<SPACE_DIM>::GetValue(const ChastePoint<SPACE_DIM>& rX) const
00040 {
00041     return mpStimulus->GetStimulus(PdeSimulationTime::GetTime());
00042 }
00043 
00044 
00046 // Explicit instantiation
00048 
00049 template class StimulusBoundaryCondition<1>;
00050 template class StimulusBoundaryCondition<2>;
00051 template class StimulusBoundaryCondition<3>;
